question: What to do when I get the error message '02_Failed to read counter (LUID:...'?
answer: Toggle the 'Detect Render GPU' button to reset the GPU monitoring initialization parameters. This will fix the error.

question: How do I disable CPU usage monitoring?
answer: You can disable CPU usage monitoring by setting the CPU usage upper threshold to >100 in the settings.

question: How do I toggle the visibility of the plot elements?
answer: You can click on the corresponding plot legend to toggle their visibility.
